description.cn: 负责工程分包商管理、总包商商务对接、重型运输成本控制等工作
description.en: Responsible for subcontractor management, EPC contractor engagement, and heavy transport cost control

responsibilities.cn:
• 工程合作方管理
    • 起草/监管7类分包合同：船务代理、码头操作、拖轮公司、吊装租赁、道路改造、电力迁改、林木修剪
    • 审核分包商账单，管控付款进度（单项目常涉及5+分包商协同）
  • 总包商(EPC)商务对接
    • 依据工程合同条款处理进度款申请、变更签证、履约保函延期
    • 主导项目索赔：因总包商原因导致的运输延误及物流成本增加的索赔
  • 重型运输成本控制
    • 监控特有成本项：桥梁加固费、临时征地费、警车开道费、超限许可证
    • 编制风电项目分标段损益报告（海运/港口/陆运）
responsibilities.en:
• Subcontractor Management
    • Draft/supervise contracts for 7 types of subcontractors: shipping agency, terminal operations, tugboat services, crane rental, road modification, power line relocation, tree trimming
    • Verify subcontractor invoices and control payment schedules (managing 5+ subcontractors per project)
  • EPC Contractor Engagement
    • Process progress payment claims, change orders, performance bond extensions under engineering contracts
    • Lead project claims against EPC contractors for delays and cost overruns caused by EPC decisions
  • Heavy Transport Cost Control
    • Monitor specialized costs: bridge reinforcement, temporary land acquisition, police escort fees, oversize permits
    • Prepare segmented P&L reports for wind projects (sea/port/land transport)

requirements.cn:
• 经验要求
    • 5年以上工程物流/建筑施工企业经验（需参与过大型设备运输项目）
    • 3年以上多类型分包商管理经验（同时管理≥3类）
    • ≥5次成功向总包商索赔经验（需面试展示证明文件）
  • 核心能力
    • 精通重型运输合同条款设计：滞期费阶梯计价、吊装事故责任界定
    • 熟悉菲律宾大件运输法规：DPWH超限许可流程、LGU地方道路使用许可、NGCP线路迁改规范
    • 总包商索赔专长：证据链构建、成本计算模型
  • 其他要求
    • 菲律宾籍，能适应项目现场工作环境
    • 持有有效驾照，能前往不同项目现场
    • 流利的英语沟通能力
requirements.en:
• Experience
    • 5+ years in engineering logistics/construction (experience with heavy equipment transport projects required)
    • 3+ years managing multiple subcontractor types (concurrently managing ≥3 types)
    • ≥5 successful claims against EPC contractors (proof required during interview)
  • Core Competencies
    • Expertise in heavy transport contract clauses: demurrage tiered pricing, crane accident liability allocation
    • Knowledge of Philippine heavy transport regulations: DPWH oversize permits, LGU road access approvals, NGCP relocation standards
    • EPC claim specialization: evidence chain development, cost modeling
  • Other Requirements
    • Filipino national, able to work at project sites
    • Valid driver's license, able to travel to different sites
    • Fluent English communication skills

preferredConditions.cn: • 有大型工程物流项目经验者优先
preferredConditions.en: • Experience in large-scale engineering logistics projects preferred

description.cn: 为中方特种设备操作手提供现场英语口语翻译服务
description.en: Provide on-site English interpretation for Chinese heavy equipment operators

responsibilities.cn:
• 为中方特种设备操作手提供现场英语口语翻译服务
  • 协助操作手与当地工作人员进行日常沟通协调
  • 翻译设备操作手册、安全规范等技术文档
  • 参与项目会议并提供中英双向翻译支持
  • 协助处理中方员工与当地社区的基本沟通
  • 记录并整理翻译日志，确保信息准确传递
responsibilities.en:
• Provide on-site English interpretation for Chinese heavy equipment operators
  • Assist operators in daily communication with local staff
  • Translate technical documents such as equipment manuals and safety regulations
  • Provide bilingual support in project meetings
  • Assist in basic communication between Chinese staff and local communities
  • Maintain interpretation logs to ensure accurate information transfer

requirements.cn:
• 基本要求
    • 中国籍应届本科毕业生
    • 英语相关专业优先（如翻译、英语、国际商务等）
    • 大学英语六级600分以上或专四/专八良好以上
  • 核心能力
    • 优秀的中英双语口语表达能力
    • 快速学习技术术语和专业知识的能力
    • 良好的跨文化沟通和理解能力
  • 个人素质
    • 吃苦耐劳，能适应项目现场环境
    • 有耐心，脾气好，能妥善处理压力
    • 积极主动，有上进心，学习能力强
    • 具备优秀的情绪管理能力
    • 良好的团队协作精神
requirements.en:
• Basic Requirements
    • Chinese fresh graduate with bachelor's degree
    • English-related majors preferred (translation, English, international business, etc.)
    • CET-6 score ≥600 or TEM-4/8 with good grade
  • Core Competencies
    • Excellent Chinese-English oral interpretation skills
    • Ability to quickly learn technical terminology and professional knowledge
    • Strong cross-cultural communication and understanding skills
  • Personal Qualities
    • Hardworking, adaptable to project site conditions
    • Patient, good-tempered, able to handle pressure
    • Proactive, motivated, fast learner
    • Excellent emotional management skills
    • Strong team collaboration spirit

preferredConditions.cn:
• 有机械、工程类知识背景
  • 通过CATTI口译三级或以上
  • 有海外学习或生活经历
  • 掌握基础菲律宾语
preferredConditions.en:
• Background in mechanical/engineering knowledge
  • CATTI Level 3 Interpretation or higher
  • Overseas study or living experience
  • Basic Filipino language skills

description.cn: 负责国际货运的全流程操作，包括订舱、报关、单证制作及跟踪
description.en: Manage end-to-end international freight operations including booking, customs clearance, documentation and tracking

responsibilities.cn:
• 负责国际货运的全流程操作，包括订舱、报关、单证制作及跟踪
  • 协调船公司、港口、仓库等各方资源，确保货物按时安全运输
  • 处理进出口货物的报关报检及相关文件准备工作
  • 监控货物运输状态，及时处理运输过程中的异常情况
  • 与客户保持良好沟通，及时反馈货物运输信息
  • 优化货运方案，降低物流成本，提高运输效率
  • 准备和处理提单、发票、装箱单等运输单据
  • 确保所有单证符合国际贸易规则和目的国海关要求
  • 审核信用证条款，确保单证一致
  • 处理进出口报关文件及相关许可证
responsibilities.en:
• Manage end-to-end international freight operations including booking, customs clearance, documentation and tracking
  • Coordinate with shipping lines, ports, warehouses to ensure timely and safe cargo transportation
  • Handle customs declaration and inspection for import/export goods
  • Monitor cargo status and resolve any transportation issues promptly
  • Maintain good communication with clients and provide shipment updates
  • Optimize shipping solutions to reduce costs and improve efficiency
  • Prepare and process shipping documents including BL, invoices, packing lists
  • Ensure all documents comply with international trade rules and destination customs requirements
  • Review L/C terms to ensure document consistency
  • Handle import/export customs documents and related permits

requirements.cn:
• 经验要求
    • 至少3年以上国际货代公司工作经验
    • 熟悉海运、空运及多式联运操作流程
    • 有大型设备或风电项目物流经验者优先
  • 专业知识
    • 精通国际贸易术语（Incoterms 2020）
    • 熟悉国际海运、空运操作流程及相关法规
    • 了解菲律宾海关进出口政策及清关流程
    • 掌握主要船公司及航空公司的操作规范
  • 技能要求
    • 熟练使用物流管理系统（如CargoWise, SAP等）
    • 精通Office办公软件，特别是Excel高级功能
    • 出色的多任务处理能力及时间管理能力
    • 优秀的英语读写能力（CET-6或同等以上）
  • 其他要求
    • 具备高度责任心和抗压能力
    • 良好的沟通协调能力和团队合作精神
    • 能适应快节奏工作环境，处理紧急情况
requirements.en:
• Experience
    • Minimum 3 years experience in international freight forwarding
    • Familiar with sea, air and multimodal transportation processes
    • Experience in heavy equipment or wind power logistics preferred
  • Professional Knowledge
    • Proficient in Incoterms 2020
    • Knowledge of international sea/air transport regulations
    • Understanding of Philippines customs policies and clearance procedures
    • Familiar with major shipping lines and airlines operations
  • Skills
    • Proficient in logistics management systems (e.g. CargoWise, SAP)
    • Advanced MS Office skills, especially Excel
    • Excellent multitasking and time management abilities
    • Strong English reading/writing skills (CET-6 or equivalent)
  • Additional Requirements
    • High sense of responsibility and stress tolerance
    • Good communication and teamwork skills
    • Ability to work in fast-paced environment and handle emergencies

preferredConditions.cn: • 有大型设备或风电项目物流经验者优先
preferredConditions.en: • Experience in heavy equipment or wind power logistics preferred
